name: Frank Benjamin
description:
I’m an easy going person and have a lots of friends, communication is the most important part of my life also I’m a patient, prudent person with sweet temper down to earth.
I am giving a try for this but why not.. But for me it is very much your personality that counts…. For me it is Honesty, receiving and giving love humour and independency come first. The other things are just icing on the cake 🙂 I want my woman to be honest and not to be afraid of showing is feeling. Also well travelled this is very important to me, I am looking for some qualities in a woman looks are not important it’s the person inside that’s matters… Grate smile, captive eyes, good hygiene and usually well dressed ( unless of course I’m working around the house ) Well rounded
